title: Peer delivering stale transactions
body:
After update geth last update,  i have now this error "Peer delivering stale transactions"
spamming my logs.

what can i do ?
`

I deleted a scam-message. Don't fall for it

> After update geth last update, i have now this error "Peer delivering stale transactions"
spamming my logs.

Well, it's usually an indication that either you, or that peer, is not quite synced. It will be fine eventually.
